text: Pyotr Kovalenko (10 October 1942 - 1993) was a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:People from Sortavala
title: Pyotr Kovalenko
